subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles scored four goals in the first period, including two by Anze Kopitar, to take a 2-0 lead over St. Louis in their Western Conference semifinal series.
snippet: Los Angeles scored four goals in the first period, including two by Anze Kopitar, to take a 2-0 lead over St. Louis in their Western Conference semifinal series.
